name: Grim Jester
description: The Grim Jester is a Medium undead creature that embodies a whimsical yet sinister presence.
memorable: It can incapacitate foes with laughter and regenerate after death.
goals: To manipulate and incapacitate foes using laughter and deception.
relations: Related to chaotic undead entities, potentially serving a trickster god.
environment: Often found in dark, mysterious, or eerie locations.
strengths: Incapacitates foes with laughter, has strong spellcasting abilities, and can regenerate.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and relies on tactics to avoid direct confrontation.
attacks: Necrotic Claw deals slashing and necrotic damage; Killing Joke incapacitates targets in laughter.
most_powerful_ability: Killing Joke can incapacitate a creature or reduce it to 0 hit points.
senses: Has darkvision up to 120 feet and a passive perception of 17.
skills: Excels in Acrobatics, Stealth, Deception, and Performance with high skill modifiers.
additional_information: Immune to necrotic and poison damage, and nonmagical weapon attacks.
Has advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.
Does not require air, food, or sleep.
Ability to cast spells without components using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.
Can create illusory duplicates of itself and another creature.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like disguise self and grease at will; magic mouth and mirror image three times per day; mislead and seeming once per day.
test_queries: undead creature that incapacitate foes with laughter
